- KeyReply: an AI powered patient engagement platform for healthcare providers
- Analytics: Power BI
- logging: Application Audit Logs
- tech stack:
  |Components |	Items |
  |API Protocol |	GraphQL, REST, SocketIO |
  |Backend Server|	Node.JS|
  |CI/CD|	Docker, Azure Dev ops|
  |Cloud Platform vendor	|Microsoft Azure|
  |Database	|Azure SQL Database|
  |ER diagram |	Entity Relationship diagram|
  |Natural language understanding (NLU)|	IBM Watson Assistant |
  |Presentation / Task runner	|HTML5, Vue.js, CSS, Babel, webpack, Gulp|
  |Programming Language|	Typescript|
  |Unit Test|	Jest|
